Good Comments: Skips around episodes, never finish subbing particular mystery arcs they start, change the openings to make it more "localized," or as I'd like to call it, wasting time. Which brings me to the next point, they take way too long to release an episode, desp

They are doing all episodes - just prioritizing story episodes over OA. Will do them later on...
Fail to maintain originality of the anime
They're awesome. Treating this anime as it should be treated. They're late yes, but their subtitles are just plain awesome. 5/5

The only group which has enough patience to do DC with quality subs. They do all the eps but prioritize manga eps over AOs. They've got really good team members who're active. They deserve a lot more respect than they get.
They do a quality job with translations, and as a bonus, they also explain all of the silly puns by showing the romaji.
Bad Comments: I like this group. Very HQ RAWs and really good translations. Also, their scripts looks great. But they're slow and not doing all episodes, just episodes they like. I like them, but they doesn't looks like a group, who'll work on each and every new episod
High Quality and careful subs! They even edited the OP when it was wrong once, also pretty darn fast!

High and Mighty attitude for very unprofessional attitude. Here is the thing. All fansubbers are doing it for nothing. And we the non speakers are eternally grateful and in awe.
In anything that you do, there has to be some ethics to it. You either do it
Good subs n easy to read :)
Closest group to DCTP in terms of quality and care towards the series... So what if they are slow...they rock!
